      Returns a list of traffic lights which have to be red before the current traffic light may be switched to green
      Methods in eu.opends.environment with parameters of type TrafficLight 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TrafficLightInternalProgram TrafficLightCenter.getInternalProgram(TrafficLight trafficLight)
      Returns the internal program a given traffic light (and thus intersection) is assigned to.
      int TrafficLightInternalProgram.getRemainingGreen(TrafficLight trafficLight)
      Computes the number of seconds that a given traffic light will be green according to the internal program schedule.
      int TrafficLightInternalProgram.getRemainingRed(TrafficLight trafficLight)
      Computes the number of seconds that a given traffic light will be in a different state than "green" according to the internal program schedule.
      TrafficLight.TrafficLightState TrafficLightPhase.getState(TrafficLight trafficLight)
      Reads a traffic light's state from this phase's state string.
      void TrafficLightInternalProgram.requestGreen(TrafficLight trafficLight)
      This method adds a traffic light to the queue of traffic lights waiting to turn green, if it is not contained yet.

      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new traffic light program and initializes it by setting the intersectionID and filtering the traffic lights of this intersection from the list of all traffic lights.

      static void HMICenter.reportRedTrafficLightCollision(TrafficLight trafficLight, Car car)
      Reports the collision of the car with a traffic light trigger to the HMI if the corresponding traffic light is red.

      Constructors in eu.opends.hmi with parameters of type TrafficLight 
      Constructor and Description
      RedTrafficLightPresentationModel(Car car, TrafficLight trafficLight)
      Initializes a red traffic light presentation model by setting the positions of the car and traffic light, the minimum distance from the traffic light to cancel the presentation and the traffic light object.
      TrafficLightPresentationModel(Simulator sim, Car car, TrafficLight triggeredTrafficLight)
      Initializes a traffic light phase assistant presentation model by setting the positions of the car and the traffic light, the minimum distance from the traffic light to cancel the presentation and the triggered traffic light.
